"Communa": "Mm-hmm, I thought you'd say so! Alright, I'll explain."
"...Though, there's not much to explain at all. It's easy stuff."
"The most important part of communication, I think, is also the most basic. You know, your hello's and thank-you's. Yeah."
"Can't hold a conversation without those, right?"
"Come on, don't be shy. Show me your best \"Howdy!\""
